attributes.additional_details: Well the government were quick enough to allow the Ukrainian people into the country are the people in Gaza not humans
attributes.background: Would like to open the doors of UK to all suffering in Gaza.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Allow Palestinian Children to Enter the UK During Ongoing Conflict: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649371

Create a scheme for orphaned children from Palestine/Israel to be adopted: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649184
